name: Car Race!
description:
Controls

Move: WASD,  Joystick ( only with mouse) and with arrows

Exit: ALT+ F4

                                         ______________________________________________    

This is my second game with a friend, it is a bit simple, it is functional .

you drive a car and you can take the laps you want, it is infinite, And it's not an open world game  I hope you like it!!
